quote: Soul meets soul on lovers lips.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: My soul will find yours.
author: Jude Deveraux,  A Knight in Shining Armor

quote: A soul mate is not found. A soul mate is recognized.
author: Vironika Tugaleva,  The Love Mindset

quote: My soul is in the sky.
author: William Shakespeare,  A Midsummer Night's Dream

quote: Selling my soul would be a lot easier if I could just find it.
author: Nikki Sixx,  The Heroin Diaries: A Year In The Life Of A Shattered Rock Star

quote: I know that your soul is on life support and that you feel lost and like you’re completely spinning out of control, but you’re finding yourself — here, tonight… even in this darkness.
author: Jennifer Elisabeth

quote: Before you find your soul mate, you must first discover your soul.
author: Charles F. Glassman,  Brain Drain The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: After soul searching, I found myself. Then I found myself giving of myself to a charity that finds missing children. It's great to be found.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: I've got soul, but I'm not a souldier.
author: The Killers,  The Killers, Hot Fuss

quote: When you're missing a peice of yourself, aching, gut wrenching emptiness begins to take over. Until you find the link that completes your very soul, the feeling will never go away. Most people find a way to fill this void, material possessions, a string of relationships, affairs, food...I bear my soul, with words, for all to see.
author: Jennifer Salaiz

quote: Seek to know thy sacred soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: My soul hurts.
author: Jennifer Elisabeth

quote: The soul is a prolonged anniversary of our lives in this world.
author: Sorin Cerin,  Wisdom Collection: The Book of Wisdom

quote: Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.
author: Plato

quote: A: The soul wanders in the dark, until it finds love. And so, wherever our love goes, there we find our soul.Q: It always happens?A: If we're lucky. And if we let ourselves be blind. Q: Instead of watching out?A: Instead of always watching out.
author: Mary Zimmerman,  Metamorphoses

quote: Love ignites spiritual fire in the soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: When soul meets soul on lovers' lips.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley,  Prometheus Unbound

quote: What door is opened into soul through our wounds.
author: James Hillman

quote: When soul risesInto lipsYou feel the kiss You have wanted
author: Rumi

quote: Hope is the heartbeat of the soul~
author: Michelle Horst

quote: There is more to a soul than what others see
author: Colleen Coble,  Fire Dancer

quote: It is only through mystery and madness that the soul is revealed
author: Thomas Moore

quote: Searching outside of you is Samsara (the world). Searching within you leads to Nirvana.
author: Amit Ray,  Yoga and Vipassana: An Integrated Life Style

quote: Every book, every volume you see here, has a soul. The soul of the person who wrote it and of those who read it and lived and dreamed with it. Every time a book changes hands, every time someone runs his eyes down its pages, its spirit grows and strengthens.
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón,  The Shadow of the Wind

quote: Spiritual yearning is the homesickness of the soul.
author: Ma Jaya Sati Bhagavati,  The 11 Karmic Spaces: Choosing Freedom from the Patterns That Bind You

quote: Soul inhabits body that fits.
author: Toba Beta,  My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: Love is written by the soul.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: When you are soul-centered, you can focus your attention where and when you want to, easily, without distraction. You know to look for what you want to see and experience. You know that what you seek you shall find, and what you focus on in life will be more prominent in your awareness. You know your awareness is powerful and creative."~ Sarah McLean
author: Sarah McLean,  Soul-Centered: Transform Your Life in 8 Weeks with Meditation

quote: There’s a drive in a lost soul—in one that is searching for acceptance, companionship, belonging, whatever you want to call it. The slightest coincidence ignites a spark that one hopes will lead to something meaningful.
author: Doug Cooper,  Outside In

quote: Once the soul awakens, the search begins and you can never go back. From then on, you are inflamed with a special longing that will never again let you linger in the lowlands of complacency and partial fulfillment. The eternal makes you urgent. You are loath to let compromise or the threat of danger hold you back from striving toward the summit of fulfillment.
author: John O'Donohue,  Anam Cara: A Book of Celtic Wisdom

quote: Few if any seemed to have grasped the Principle of Reality; new knowledge leads always to yet more awesome mysteries. Greater physiological knowledge of the brain makes the existence of the soul less possible yet more probable by the nature of the search.
author: Stephen King,  The Gunslinger

quote: I peered deeper and found my soul. A little tattered and with some holes, but there all the same. It had always been there, I realized with shock.
author: Maria V. Snyder,  Poison Study

quote: Dig deep. Find your way to your soul.
author: Kami Garcia,  Beautiful Creatures

quote: Whatever satisfies the soul is truth.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: If you're losing your soul and you know it, then you've still got a soul left to lose
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: Without you in my arms, I feel an emptiness in my soul. I find myself searching the crowds for your face - I know it's an impossibility, but I cannot help myself.
author: Nicholas Sparks,  Message in a Bottle

quote: And when at last you find someone to whom you feel you can pour out your soul, you stop in shock at the words you utter— they are so rusty, so ugly, so meaningless and feeble from being kept in the small cramped dark inside you so long.
author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath

quote: A soul gives power to the mind; and the mind empowers the soul
author: Jeremy Aldana

quote: May your soul be rooted in love.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: To have found God and still to pursue Him is the soul’s paradox of love.
author: A.W. Tozer,  The Pursuit of God

quote: Be strong in soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: One of the deepest longings of the human soul is to be seen.
author: John O'Donohue

quote: This first glance of a soul which does not yet know itself is like dawn in the heavens; it is the awakening of something radiant and unknown.
author: Victor Hugo,  Les Misérables

quote: When you miss someone....it’s weird…your body doesn’t function normally..as it should. Because I miss you, and my heart…it’s not steady…my soul it sings numb. Fingers are cold…like you…your soul.
author: Coco J. Ginger

quote: How can you hear your soul if everyone is talking?
author: Mary Doria Russell,  Children of God

quote: A soul that becomes the place where divine grace is harbored and encouraged joins the class of the immortals and lives on into eternal greatness.
author: Garey Gordon,  The Values Pursued Life: Excellence and Greatness from Within

quote: Your soul is the priestess of memory, selecting, sifting, and ultimately gathering your vanishing days toward presence.
author: John O'Donohue,  Anam Cara: A Book of Celtic Wisdom

quote: All you can ever achieve is a sense of your soul. You gain little glimpses of its light, colors, and contours. You feel the inspiration of its possibilities and the wonder of its mysteries.
author: John O'Donohue,  Anam Cara: A Book of Celtic Wisdom

quote: The soul is placed in the body like a rough diamond, and must be polished, or the luster of it will never appear.
author: Daniel Defoe

quote: Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.
author: Zora Neale Hurston
